state: You are now playing a profound round of TextWorld! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to try to venture east. Then, venture south. After that, try to go to the south. Once you succeed at that, try to go west. If you can finish that, try to move north. That done, make an effort to take a trip east. After that, try to take a trip south. Okay, and then, try to travel south. Then, travel south. And then, venture south. After that, attempt to go east. Then, venture south. With that done, travel west. And then, attempt to take a trip north. That done, retrieve the coin from the floor of the restroom.
